DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study investigate impact sterile saline drop formulate hypo-osmolar level CL comfort comparison iso-osmolar drop , group symptomatic CL wearer .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Hypo-osmolar Drops Contact Lens Comfort
DOC.criteria: Is least 17 year age ; Has full legal capacity volunteer ; Has read sign information consent letter ; Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule ; Is willing able stay within School Optometry Vision Science building duration Study Day ; Currently wear daily , soft , frequent replacement lens license Canada ( daily , biweekly monthly disposable lens , extend wear , monovision ) least 3 days/week 6 hours/day 2 month prior enrolment ; Is symptomatic accord follow classification : Reports difference average comfortable wear time habitual lens least 3 hour ; Fall symptomatic group per Young 's criterion ( Appendix 4 ) . Is able remove insert lenses ; Owns wearable pair spectacle ; Is willing wear study lenses 10 hour ; Has visual acuity ( VA ) correctable logMAR 0.20 good eye ; Shows acceptable lens fit habitual lens ; Is participate concurrent clinical research study ; Has know active* ocular disease and/ infection ; Has ocular abnormality would contraindicate contact lens wear ; Has know infection inflammation require treatment systemic condition opinion investigator may affect study measure ; Is use systemic topical medication option investigator may affect study measure ; Has know sensitivity diagnostic pharmaceutical product use study ; Is pregnant lactating ( verbal communication ) due potential ocular physiology change may affect study outcome ; Is aphakic ; Has undergone refractive error surgery ; Is member CCLR directly involve data collection . *For purpose study , active ocular disease define infection inflammation require therapeutic treatment . Mild ( i.e . consider clinically relevant ) lid abnormality ( blepharitis , meibomian gland dysfunction , papilla ) , corneal conjunctival stain dry eye consider active ocular disease . Neovascularization corneal scar result previous hypoxia , infection inflammation therefore active .
